destination.description: The name of S3 bucket for the exported log data. The bucket must be in the same AWS region.

destinationPrefix.description: The prefix used as the start of the key for every object exported. If you don't specify a value, the default is exportedlogs.

from.description: The start time of the range for the request, expressed as the number of milliseconds since Jan 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC. Events with a timestamp earlier than this time are not exported.

logGroupName.description: The name of the log group.

logStreamNamePrefix.description: Export only log streams that match the provided prefix. If you don't specify a value, no prefix filter is applied.

taskName.description: The name of the export task.

to.description: The end time of the range for the request, expressed as the number of milliseconds since Jan 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC. Events with a timestamp later than this time are not exported.
